thread.title: Watford leads Hampton to 21-7 win over Delaware State
thread.title_full: Watford leads Hampton to 21-7 win over Delaware State

title: Watford leads Hampton to 21-7 win over Delaware State
text:
Watford leads Hampton to 21-7 win over Delaware State By -   
HAMPTON, Va. (AP) - David Watford threw for 194 yards and one touchdown and ran for another as Hampton jumped out to a 14-0 lead on its way to a 21-7 victory over winless Delaware State on Saturday. 
Watford scored from the 27 with 6:21 left in the first quarter and then hit Rashawn Proctor on a 9-yard scoring strike for a 14-0 lead with 1:47 left in the first. 
Neither team scored again until Oral Varcciann scooped up a Kobie Lain fumble and rumbled 83 yards for a 21-0 lead with 10:04 left in the final quarter. 
Twarn Mixson grabbed seven passes for 72 yards and Chistopher Dukes rushed for 85 yards on 15 carries for Hampton (3-3, 2-2 Mid-Eastern Athletic). 
Delaware State (0-5, 0-2) scored when Gilbert Rivera ran in from the 10 late in the fourth quarter. Rivera also threw for 183 yards.
